com.oracle.truffle.api.instrumentation

Annotation Type GenerateWrapper


  • @Retention(value=CLASS)
 @Target(value=TYPE)
public @interface GenerateWrapper
    Generates a default wrapper subclass of an annotated InstrumentableNode subclass. The generated subclass is has the same class name as the original class name plus the 'Wrapper' suffix. The generated class has default package visibility. All non-final and non-private methods starting with execute are overridden by the generated wrapper. The generated overrides notifies execution events as required by probes. Other abstract methods are directly delegated to the wrapped node. No other methods are overridden by the generated wrapper. At least one method starting with execute must be non-private and non-final. Every execute method must have VirtualFrame as the first declared parameter.

    Example Usage: 

     @GenerateWrapper
 abstract class ExpressionNode extends Node implements InstrumentableNode {

     abstract Object execute(VirtualFrame frame);

     @Override
     public WrapperNode createWrapper(ProbeNode probeNode) {
         return new ExpressionNodeWrapper(this, probeNode);
     }
 }

    Example that ignores return values: 

     @GenerateWrapper
 abstract class ExpressionNode extends Node implements InstrumentableNode {

     abstract Object execute(VirtualFrame frame);

     @Override
     public WrapperNode createWrapper(ProbeNode probeNode) {
         return new ExpressionNodeWrapper(this, probeNode);
     }

     @GenerateWrapper.OutgoingConverter
     final Object convertOutgoing(Object outgoingValue) {
         return null;
     }
 }

    Example that converts incoming byte values to int. 

     @GenerateWrapper
 abstract class ExpressionNode extends Node implements InstrumentableNode {

     abstract Object execute(VirtualFrame frame);

     @Override
     public WrapperNode createWrapper(ProbeNode probeNode) {
         return new ExpressionNodeWrapper(this, probeNode);
     }

     @GenerateWrapper.IncomingConverter
     final Object convertIncoming(Object incomingValue) {
         if (incomingValue instanceof Byte) {
             return (int) ((byte) incomingValue);
         }
         return incomingValue;
     }
 }
    Since:
    0.33
    See Also:
    InstrumentableNode, ProbeNode
